metadata.title: CVE-2020-35376 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Xpdf 4.02 allows stack consumption because of an incorrect subroutinereference in a Type 1C font charstring, related to the FoFiType1C::getOp()function.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
